entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
